org.dotplot.core
Interface IConfiguration

All Known Subinterfaces:
IConverterConfiguration, IFilterConfiguration, IFMatrixConfiguration, IQImageConfiguration, ITokenizerConfiguration
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConverterConfiguration, DefaultFilterConfiguration, DefaultFMatrixConfiguration, DefaultTokenizerConfiguration, GridConfiguration, QImageConfiguration
public interface IConfiguration

This interface serves as supertype of all configurations used in the dotplot system.

Author:
Christian Gerhardt

Method Summary
 IConfiguration copy()
          Returns a copy of the Configuration.
 IConfiguration objectForm(java.lang.String serivalizedForm)
          Creates an Configuration object of a serialized form.
 java.lang.String serializedForm()
          Returns the serialized form of the Configuration.
 

Method Detail

copy

IConfiguration copy()
Returns a copy of the Configuration.

The copy must be independent to the original, so that modifieing the copy does not affect the original.

Returns:
A copy of the Configuration.

serializedForm

java.lang.String serializedForm()
                                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Returns the serialized form of the Configuration.

This statement must always be true:
configuration.equals(configuration.objectForm(configuration.serializedForm))) == true

Returns:
The configuration in a serialized form.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported.
See Also:
objectForm(String)

objectForm

IConfiguration objectForm(java.lang.String serivalizedForm)
                          throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Creates an Configuration object of a serialized form.

This statement must always be true:
configuration.equals(configuration.objectForm(configuration.serializedForm))) == true

Parameters:
serivalizedForm - The serialized form of a Configuration
Returns:
The Configuration object of the serialized form.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported.
See Also:
serializedForm()
